properties.h5: Where and what I have worked on

properties.details: Leading a team of 3 UI developers in crafting a healthcare dashboard for TRHC, showcasing expertise in ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, Tanstack UI, and Material UI.
Designed and implemented dynamic smart tables for user, organization, customer, email queue, and fax queue data, ensuring responsiveness and user-friendly interfaces.
Implemented robust smart table functionalities, including sorting, pagination, search, row selection, and user preferences.
Utilized Tanstack UI utilities and ReactJS to build the application from scratch, focusing on security through JWT token-based authentication and efficient data retrieval with RTK queries.
Successfully delivered the healthcare project, providing role based access control and restrictions.
Contributed to AIG projects, specializing in loan features for the financial application.
Leveraged Node.js and Express.js to design and implement backend functionalities for one of the projects.

Contributed significantly to internationalization efforts, making the application accessible across multiple languages and countries.
Ensured website responsiveness on various devices, addressing bugs, and testing features using BrowserStack.
Involved in writing application-level code to interact with APIs using AJAX, AXIOS, JSON.
Used Lighthouse and react profiler tool for optimising code quality and application performance.
